item.title: Unveiling the future of AI innovation for ISVs
item.description: At Microsoft Ignite in November 2024, we announced offerings and resources to empower software companies in the landscape of AI-powered experiences. The post Unveiling the future of AI innovation for ISVs appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/unveiling-the-future-of-ai-innovation-for-isvs/
